content: one-two-three slippers © chris de longpré 2017 all rights reserved www knittingatknoon com one piece no sewing two colors three sizes in these quick-to-knit slippers for women compact enough to tuck in your bag or pocket and take with you anywhere uses heavy worsted yarn in three siz- es based on women s shoe sizes small 5-6 medium 7-8 and large 9-10 this pattern is free for non-commercial use materials yarn heavy worsted wt yarn wool or blend mc main color 65-75 yds cc con- trast color 40-55 yds slippers on model are worked in brown sheep lamb s pride worsted needles suitable needles for knitting in the round us size 9 or size needed to obtain gauge other tapestry needle gauge 16 sts = 4 in stockinet st notes and abbreviations 1 bobble means bind off 2 co means cast on 3 jmco judy s magic cast on https //www youtube com/watch v=1pmxrdz-cwo 4 k means knit 5 kfb means knit in the front and back of the same st 6 k2tog/k3tog means knit 2/3 sts together 7 p means purl 8 p2tog means purl 2 sts together 9 repeat means repeat 10 sl1 means slip one stitch 11 ssk / sssk means slip slip knit / slip slip slip knit slip the first stitch as if to knit slip the second stitch as if to purl then insert the left-hand needle into the front of the slipped stitches and knit them together through their back loops for an sssk slip the first stitch as if to knit and slip the next two stitches together as if to purl then insert the left-hand needle into the front of the slipped stitches and knit them together through their back loops 12 st / sts means stitch / stitches 13 these slippers are knit in the round you can use any method you like i prefer magic loop 14 when working the sole it can be helpful to mark the right side with a safety pin- type stitch marker since the garter stitch will appear to be essentially the same on both sides 15 instructions are given for size s with m and l in parenthesis if only one number is given it is for all sizes slipper instructions the pattern starts at the center of the sole and works upward to the cuff the main color mc is used for the sole and the cuff and the contrast color cc is used for the uppers sole with mc
